```csharp
* Image Acquisition 01: Code generated by Image Acquisition 01
open_framegrabber ('GigEVision2', 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 0, 'progressive', -1, 'default', -1, 'false', 'default', '12-3#', 0, -1, AcqHandle)
grab_image_start (AcqHandle, -1)

* 初始化计数器和文件保存路径
count := 0
* 指定保存图片的路径
basePath := 'C:/Users/DJ/Desktop/北栈桥自动定位图片/20241002晚/' 

while (true)
    grab_image_async (Image, AcqHandle, -1)

    * 构建文件名
    fileName := basePath + 'image_' + count + '.bmp'
    
    * 保存图像
    write_image (Image, 'bmp', 0, fileName)
    
    * 更新计数器
    count := count + 1

    * Image Acquisition 01: Do something
endwhile

close_framegrabber (AcqHandle)
```
